attributes.action: employ the same lawyers used by the Italian Government to write british laws which will allow us to deport EU undesireables back to their home countries AND allow us to disregard the Human Rights Act for other foreign criminals in the very same way the Italian Authorities seem able to do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Government continually tells the electorate that it is not possible to deport EU criminals to their home country and that the Human Rights Act does not allow foreign criminals to be returned to a country with which there is no 'Memorandum of Understanding' over the treatment of deportees.  THE ITALIAN GOVERNMENT SEEMS TO HAVE OVERCOME THESE HINDRANCES TO PEACE AND TRANQUILITY IN THEIR COUNTRY.  IT IS TIME WE BRITISH TAXPAYERS ALSO BENEFITTED FROM THE SKILLS OF ITALIAN LAW MAKERS.
